name: DEX: Demonic eXtension Program
description:
"We tought we were doing the right thing..."

The town is gone... isn't?

Even if we were ok.

I wonder how long can people believe in what they're told, and how many people can believe in a lie?

Ermingild City was created as a project, a self-sufficent town rejecting all of imports and subsisting on its own product and primary resourcer, The fact the town was in a wonderful geological spot, seemed to allow the poeple in charge of its contruction a lot of liberties, however, several murders have been casting a shadow in this modern town, and then a cataclysm occurs, an earthquake hits Erminglid City...

---------------------------------------------------------

  • This is going to be a high difficutly game where resources are in a certain way important and also not.
  • Each playable character is going to have it's own Elemental resource designated by DEX.
  • Each player and some enemies will have around them an active Elemental Barrier which will protect from the incoming damage by rising the resitance, however once the barrier is broken the squishy playabale characters will be under heavy fire.
  • Learn and Equip Active and Passive Abilities to make your characters better at fighting and at resisting attacks.
